lead_paragraph: Jamie Langenbrunner had two goals and an assist Friday night to lead the Devils to a 3-2 victory over the visiting Senators while Dmitry Afanasenkov gave the Lightning a shootout victory against the Islanders.
snippet: Jamie Langenbrunner had two goals and an assist Friday night to lead the Devils to a 3-2 victory over the visiting Senators while Dmitry Afanasenkov gave the Lightning a shootout victory against the Islanders.
